title: Looking for Jgler and Support main Silver +

replies.body:
That sounds quite like myself and my roommate. Support is my best role and my preferred champions in the role are: Braum, Leona, Morgana or Vel'Koz/Lulu if we have a tank and no AP damage. 
He plays jungle almost exclusively and he mains Vi, but is also quite good on Rammus, J4, Amumu, 
I'm Silver 2 atm and he hasn't done his promos this season I'm pretty sure. He doesn't like soloQ.
Welp as it stands my IGN is Sikitywiked and his is ProudLosers if you wanted to look at the lolking stats or something, idk how it works haha

I can play everyone of those champs but sona and reksai, effectively and strategically. I was gold 5 last season and planning on starting my ranked promos soon as I am still unranked this season. Ign: ExplodingTNT

Hey yeah i can support :) 
IGN: Posso The Pimp
silver 3 atm
I can jungle all them 3 and heaps more
Does it count if we decided we want to have fun with broznies(Silver rather boring, bronzies are funny)? {{champion:254}}  OP, DITTO {{champion:32}}
